basic.floral_language:
Cyclamen neapolitanum
Floriography: hospitable, passionate and beautiful. 
Flowers of the cyclamen are unique and bright colored with intensive scent. Dark green heart-shaped possess strips. Though the name of the flower in many languages associated with pig because it was considered as food of pigs, the transliteral Chinese name represents itself as a guest from fairy land. The flower has been adopted in Chinese culture to express hospitality to guests by placing it in hallway, in front of doors of house, living room or bedroom.
Cyclamen prefers places with plenty of sunlight. Move it out of direct sunlight during its dormancy in hot summer. Bloom time goes from November to next May, lasting for two to three weeks. Flowers could bloom again if cutting wilted flowers after bloom.
basic.blooming: Flowering period November-May, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color red, pink, purple, or in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, dormancy in summer under high temperature, may half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, reduce watering when in summer dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 10-15 days in spring and autumn, except summer in dormancy
maintenance.pruning: Remove yellowing leaves and withered flowers timely
